strings.Value: "Be polite, dwarf. You're in my domain."
[Attack] "I will not let anyone speak to me in this tone!"
{n}The dwarf standing on the cliff gives you a stern look.{/n} "Ah, there you are, at last. That was a long wait! Froze my... Ahem! My feet off!"
"And what are you going to do? Kick me out? Pff! Politeness has to be earned. I don't see a {mf|king|queen} in front of me, but a spoiled child who wants everything done {mf|his|her} way!"

"There is none! I don't know what my brothers and sisters think but as far as I'm concerned, you don't deserve trials by masters yet! I'll tell you what: a neophyte should test you first! Set off to the Castle of Knives. And quickly, not like your usual lazy gait!"

"Yeah right, {mf|he|she} won't let me..." {n}The dwarf whispers a spell, and boundless peace and tranquility descend upon you. Unable to even reach for your weapon, you watch Puja leave, mumbling something.{/n}
"Do we really have to run around and do what these madmen tell us? Can't I punch him, at least once? Please! You know... to test his convictions!"
"When telling us about the trial, Kamala described the ability to subdue anger as being among its conditions. I believe we are now being tested for this very skill."
